meanings.definition: The act of being present at a place or event.
meanings.sent1: Her attendance at the meeting was appreciated by the team.
meanings.sent2: The school's attendance policy requires students to be present in class.
meanings.sent3: His constant attendance at the gym earned him the title of 'Fitness King'.
meanings.sent4: The attendance of the sun at dawn marks the beginning of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The attendance of the audience was crucial for the success of the play.

meanings.definition: The number of people present at a particular place or event.
meanings.sent1: The concert's attendance exceeded all expectations.
meanings.sent2: The low attendance at the game was disappointing for the team.
meanings.sent3: The attendance of squirrels in the park always increases during autumn.
meanings.sent4: The attendance of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The attendance of guests at the wedding made it a joyous occasion.
